name: Duelist Kingdom (Rule Card)
text:
RULES:
? Starting LP is 2000.
? Monsters can be Normal Summoned in face-up Defense Position.
? Level 5+ monsters must be Normal Summoned/Set without Tribute(s), unless required for its Normal Summon or the card says "You can Tribute Summon this card" in its effect text.
? Ignition Effects of the turn player's monsters can be activated on Summon.
? If a monster(s) on the field is destroyed by card effect, the controller takes damage equal to half of the ATK the monster(s) had.
? Set Spells can be activated like Trap Cards.
? Direct Attacks are not allowed.
? Only 1 monster can declare an attack per turn.
? If you do not control a monster by the end of your turn, you lose the Duel.
